conbody.note:
This release fixes a problem that allowed a user in one account to hijack a console session state from a user in a different account, when both users had the same user name. For more information, see EUCA-6567.
Eucalyptus recommends that you update your Eucalyptus cloud to 3.3.0.1. For more information about upgrading, see Appendix A: Upgrading Eucalyptus in the Installation Guide.
